titles.title: The Stars in Their Courses Above

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The stars in their courses above
Shine for Your glory; You alone are God
By You every mountain was formed
To tell of the story; You alone are God
Eternally worthy of praise
We join with creation and sing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, for all that You are
For all that You've done
I will praise You
Lord, for all that You are
For all that You'll do
I will praise You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The roar of Your thunder and rain
Tell of Your power; You alone are God
The people You've called and redeemed
Bow in surrender; You alone are God
Eternally worthy of praise
We join with creation and sing

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Never ending, unfailing
Everlasting, unfading
You are
